mapper.delete: delete from tbl_svrlst where seq in (${chkdel})
mapper.select: SELECT seq, svr_nm, svr_domain, svr_ip, svr_vip, '1' as svr_used, CASE WHEN svr_port is null THEN 'N' WHEN svr_port = '' THEN 'N' ELSE svr_port END as svr_port, svr_dc, insert_dt FROM tbl_svrlst
select tenant_vpn_used as vpn_used from tbl_tenant_config where domain =#{svr_domain}

SELECT seq, svr_nm, svr_domain, svr_ip, svr_vip, svr_dc, svr_port , svr_used, insert_dt FROM tbl_svrlst WHERE svr_nm not like 'INFLUX_BUCKET' and svr_nm not like 'INFLUX_ORG' and svr_nm not like 'INFLUX_TOKEN'
order by seq desc OFFSET #{pagingVo.limitStart} LIMIT #{pagingVo.recordSize}
SELECT * FROM tbl_svrlst order by seq desc
SELECT count(*) as tbl_cnt FROM tbl_svrlst
SELECT * FROM tbl_policy_package_list WHERE pu_name like 'hamonize%';
